hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT CREATED_BY, TO_CHAR(CREATION_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS CREATION_DATE, ENABLED_FLAG, LAST_UPDATED_BY, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LOOKUP_CODE, LOOKUP_TYPE, MEANING, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, TO_CHAR(FROM_DATE_ACTIVE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS FROM_DATE_ACTIVE, LOOKUP_ID, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE_ACTIVE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS TO_DATE_ACTIVE FROM SYS_COMMON_LOOKUPS WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO SYS_COMMON_LOOKUPS ( CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, ENABLED_FLAG, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LOOKUP_CODE, LOOKUP_TYPE, MEANING, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, DESCRIPTION, DISPLAY_ORDER, FROM_DATE_ACTIVE, LOOKUP_ID, TO_DATE_ACTIVE ) VALUES ( ${CREATED_BY}, ${CREATION_DATE}, ${ENABLED_FLAG}, ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, ${LOOKUP_CODE}, ${LOOKUP_TYPE}, ${MEANING}, ${ATTRIBUTE1}, ${ATTRIBUTE2}, ${ATTRIBUTE3}, ${ATTRIBUTE4}, ${ATTRIBUTE5}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DISPLAY_ORDER}, ${FROM_DATE_ACTIVE}, ${LOOKUP_ID}, ${TO_DATE_ACTIVE} )

UPDATE SYS_COMMON_LOOKUPS SET CREATED_BY = ${CREATED_BY}, CREATION_DATE = ${CREATION_DATE}, ENABLED_FLAG = ${ENABLED_FLAG}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = ${LAST_UPDATED_BY}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = ${LAST_UPDATE_DATE}, LOOKUP_CODE = ${LOOKUP_CODE}, LOOKUP_TYPE = ${LOOKUP_TYPE}, MEANING = ${MEANING}, ATTRIBUTE1 = ${ATTRIBUTE1}, ATTRIBUTE2 = ${ATTRIBUTE2}, ATTRIBUTE3 = ${ATTRIBUTE3}, ATTRIBUTE4 = ${ATTRIBUTE4}, ATTRIBUTE5 = ${ATTRIBUTE5}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DISPLAY_ORDER = ${DISPLAY_ORDER}, FROM_DATE_ACTIVE = ${FROM_DATE_ACTIVE}, LOOKUP_ID = ${LOOKUP_ID}, TO_DATE_ACTIVE = ${TO_DATE_ACTIVE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
